subcategory.title: C2000 Architecture
subcategory.name: C2000 Architecture Information
subcategory.description: The C2000 controller uses a central 32-bit CPU core coupled with a highly optimized peripheral and interrupt management bus. The peripherals run on an independent time basis which can be synchronized as needed. Code security for the on-chip Flash and RAM allows secure program and data storage.

subcategory.description: Device datasheets and peripheral user guides can be obtained by accessing the specific device web page. Data sheets include internal device details, pin functions, and electrical specifications. User guides describe device peripherals and registers
